testcase.name: Creating a new Rediffmail account - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given the Rediffmail signup page is open....................................passed When click the create account button........................................passed And "Aswin" username is entered.............................................passed And choose a "aswin123" is entered..........................................passed And check availability is clicked...........................................passed And "Passash22" is entered..................................................passed And "Passash22" is retyped..................................................passed And "aswin@gmail.com" address is entered....................................passed And "9876543210" mobile number is entered...................................passed And date of birth is selected from dropdowns................................passed And gender is selected......................................................passed And country is selected.....................................................passed And enter the capcha........................................................passed And click the create my account button......................................passed Then the account should be created successfully.............................passed
